description: Perfect for families! A rare and sought after ‘missing middle’ modern/ character townhouse with 3 beds + den/ 2.5 baths set on a quiet side street in the very popular Cedar Cottage neighbourhood. The home spans three levels with a bright, open main floor designed for daily family living. Windows on both ends provide excellent cross-ventilation, while the living area opens through French doors to a private, south-facing front yard. An efficient kitchen anchors the space. The entire top floor is the primary suite, with vaulted ceilings, ensuite, den, and a sunny south-facing patio. Underground parking with direct unit access and 2 storage rooms. Dickens Elementary catchment. More info on our website: look us up! OPEN HOUSE CANCELLED!
